sub_title: ESG Academy / Master of Business Administration / Regional Sustainability and Continuous Improvement Manager at Yusen Logistics (Europe)
summary:
Studying at ESG Academy, MBA Graduate 2018. Professional with educational and working background in logistics.
Influence and advise on the development and execution of strategic sustainability initiatives: engage, educate, and influence internal and external stakeholders to perform on the organization's purpose to cherish the world in a safe, responsible, and sustainable manner.
High-grade in leading continuous improvements (Lean 6 Sigma and Kaizen), business process organization and optimization, project management, and performance measurement in multicultural environments: employed by British, German, Dutch, American, Japanese, and Russian companies.
Practice emotional intelligence of transformational leadership. Provide support to team members by empowering, motivating, coaching, facilitating, and building on one’s strengths and potential. 
Goal-oriented, well-structured, efficient planner, focus on strategy, positive approach, self-motivated. Constant learner.  
Lead by example, empathy and active listening.

school.name: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School
University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School

education.field_of_study: Foreign Trade Management, International Logistics specialty

awards.title: FedEx Bravo Zulu
awards.description: Outstanding work in building a collaborative network of Customer Experience Task Force teams. Through the monthly CE Task Force meetings focusing on the Voice of the Customer.

certifications.name: Organization & Relationship Systems Coaching (ORSC) Fundamentals course

profile_positions.location: Europe Head Office, Schiphol-Rijk, North Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
•	Lead and drive the Sustainability related strategic initiatives
•	Setup framework, track, and report on company’s strategic sustainability goal
•	Review sustainability initiative across various projects and identify, organize and share best practices on sustainability
•	Oversee the overall execution, mission, and efficiency of the sustainability program
•	Analyze data for Scope 1, 2 and 3 GHG emissions with strategic actions derived to reduce the emissions continuously
•	Stay informed about sustainability industry trends, new technologies in the different markets
•	Provide Leadership in sustainability on various platforms in the company
•	Have a commercial mindset and work with our Key Account Managers ensuring they have a solid foundation related to sustainability and business propositions
•	Create the content and enable continuous enganing communication on Sustainability via various channels
profile_positions.title: Regional Sustainability and Continuous Improvement Manager

profile_positions.location: Europe Head Office, Schiphol-Rijk, North Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
•	Lead, guide and empower a team of Kaizen experts with a continuous improvement way of working mindset across EU region
•	Provide strong stakeholder management: regularly align goals, objectives and required support with key stakeholders across all levels
•	Act as an ambassador and role model for Continuous Improvement 
•	Train, coach, and challenge business stakeholders at all levels of the organization to foster a Continuous Improvement mindset 
•	Initiate and drive projects and initiatives with focus on change management and collaboration
•	Facilitate operational excellence and process improvements using lean formats to drive from ideas to solutions
•	Identify and implement new trends and approaches to further deliver and sustain results
•	As a close partner to the Leadership Team, lead the execution of the CI deployment program
profile_positions.title: Continuous Improvement Manager

profile_positions.location: FedEx Express Nederlands B.V., Europe Head Office, North Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
In a period of Integration and Transformation (FedEx acquired TNT in 2016 - 2021)

•	Steer continuous improvement support for 38 FedEx Strategic Global Accounts 
•	Optimize, develop and improve the efficiency of the business processes by applying quality driven management (Lean Six Sigma) principles and philosophy.
•	Act as a Project Management Officer to initiate, lead and coordinate cross-regional and cross-functional processes and related analysis to ensure project completeness. Directly responsible for planning, design and implementation of complex, sensitive or high impact strategic initiatives. Perform and participate in reviews of existing processes to ensure appropriate standards and rules are applied. 
•	Oversee team projects/initiatives in order to deliver planned results on time and within budget. Support the team using project management tools to plan, control and execute various project /programs. Analyze the process and prepare innovative recommendations for areas of improvement. 
•	Support implementation and communication of changes internally and to external stakeholders
•	Validate or complete accurate and timely reporting. Compile data from all relevant sources.
•	Identify risks and opportunities within key processes in the area/department. Share findings with Senior Management. 
•	Build effective networks relationships within own team and with key stakeholders across the business in order to achieve optimal business outcomes. Maintain external alignments with customers, vendors, relevant subject matter experts (SMEs).
•	Facilitate alignment and best practice sharing
profile_positions.title: Customer Logistics Management Specialist, Customer Experience

profile_positions.location: FedEx Express Nederlands B.V., Europe Head Office, North Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
• Develop project scopes and objectives, involving all relevant stakeholders in the period of TNT/FedEx integration
• Maintain and produce overviews of projects that impact Customer Experience (CE) and track progress
• Ensure that all projects are delivered on-time
• Monitor the introduction of the approved plans and create a reporting structure on the results under guidance of the CE Governance Manager/Strategy & Projects MD
• Assess whether or not the introduction of approved plans achieves the results envisaged
• Project change mapping: Map changes resultant from project completion and/or project under way for presentation to Governance bodies
• Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation
• Use approved tools and methodologies to manage and report project progress/results and assists in post-implementation review to measure success in service improvements
profile_positions.title: Governance Project Manager, Strategy and Program, Customer Experience

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading and deploying performance improvement projects using knowledge in Lean Six Sigma.
•	Control, continuous improvement and measurement of logistics service quality delivered (KPIs) ; process diagnostics, identification of root causes for under-performance and corrective actions for process improvement 
•	Contribution to the expansion of best practices and optimization of resources /tools within projects and across performance improvement efforts;
•	Maintain knowledge of organizational Quality Management System policies, processes and procedures. 
•	Facilitation at corporate trainings and cross-department meetings to achieve company goals
profile_positions.title: Head of Business Process Organization Department

profile_positions.description:
•	Contact suppliers (shipping lines, truckers and customs brokers) to negotiate better prices for FCL, LCL, inland delivery; long-term contracts, credit terms, wrong invoices etc. 
•	Prepare commercial offers, meeting new and existing clients 
•	Launch and support insurance program, training and education on new insurance product; solve inquiries including pricing, coverage, restrictions, system implementation; review cargo insurance performance versus target; claim handling
profile_positions.title: Ocean Commercial Center Leading Specialist, Country Cargo Insurance Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
•	Engagement with customers on ongoing basis to ensure successful relationship; meeting clients and discussing current problems, potential and future business, 
•	Maintaining frequent phone/email communication; assist to sales executive in managing account plan and new customers’ pipeline; gathering market information; rate quotations
profile_positions.title: External Sales Support (Key Accounts)

profile_positions.description: •	Monitoring customers’ orders and daily requests,  checking manifests, producing and issuing invoices, checking transport documents delivery instructions, arranging container releases, following up longstanding containers, answering customer enquiries and claims, concluding agreements, working with customs documents and customs brokers, budgeting, reporting, making presentations and arranging business meetings
profile_positions.title: Logistics Coordinator

profile_positions.description: •	Controlling clients’ debts on daily basis, timely collection of freight and other receivables, reconciliations with clients, handling dispute invoices, working in compliance with company credit policy and freight procedures, preparation of financial outstanding reports, credit reports analysis
profile_positions.title: Freight Collector

profile_positions.description: Preparation of monthly reports upon the company’s activity indexes, monitoring and analyzing monthly operating results against budget, overseeing daily operations of the finance department consolidation data from different departments, assisting to preparation of the official annual report of actual revenues, transfers, and expenses.
profile_positions.title: Finance Controller

profile_positions.description: Responsible for smooth and effective functioning of the Library, managing library activities and material to provide flexible access to readers, coordinate with administrative staff to attend to Readers’ requirements, dealing with customers, providing help with English literature, rendering service in choosing courses for exams, learning materials, literature, music, films; working with internal information systems.
profile_positions.title: Consultant in Library
